text: She's been romantically linked to Oscar - winning actor Russell Crowe, 54, since the middle of last year. And now, Terri Irwin, 54, the widow of the late Crocodile Hunter Steve, has finally set the record straight on rumours that the pair are an item. Appearing on The Sunday Project, the mother - of - two gushed over the Gladiator star and joked that she was besotted with him.'I am in love with him': Terri Irwin ( right ) has set the record straight on romance rumours with Oscar - winning actor Russell Crowe ( left ) after speculation they were an item'I am in love with him, I have to admit it,'Terri told the show's co - host, Lisa Wilkinson, when questioned about the pair.
